attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Stop the bullying tactics and undermnining in the workplace by the police federation of England & Wales with regard to Police Community Support Officers.

A recognised defintion of Bullying in the workplace on the Health & Safety Executive website is: 'undermining colleagues in the workplace'.

The police federation of England & Wales has habitually fitted this criteria over the past 4 years and is guilty of bullying Police Community Support Officers across the country.
